description: Office furniture for a library, including various office chairs, desks, and other office equipment
duration_in_months: If fulfilled on the expected contract start date, the contract will last approximately 14 months.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement: Adjustable Desks and Accessories

#### Overview

Library and Archives Canada (LAC) invites qualified suppliers to bid on a major contract for the purchase and delivery of adjustable desks and accessories. This contract is open to suppliers who are registered in the SAP Canadian Business Intelligence (CBI) program.

#### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: 5Z011-23-0218
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-11-28
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-20T14:00:00
*   **Contracting Entity**: Library and Archives Canada, 395 Wellington Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0N4, Canada
*   **End User Entity**: Library and Archives Canada
*   **Contact Information**: Legault, Isabelle
    *   Email: receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca
    *   Phone: 613-410-4428

#### Contract Description

•   The contract covers the supply of office furniture, including adjustable desks and accessories, to be delivered to 550 De la Cité, Gatineau, Quebec, by February 24, 2023.
•   Suppliers must be registered in the SAP Canadian Business Intelligence (CBI) program and holding a valid contract for the administration of the program.
•   The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and other applicable trade agreements.

#### Technical Specifications

Please refer to the attached documents for detailed technical specifications and requirements.

#### How to Respond

*   Pre-qualified suppliers must log in to the BidPost system to view and download the solicitation document at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
*   Suppliers must submit their bids electronically through the BidPost system.
*   Bids must be received by 14:00:00 EST on the tender closing date.

#### Notice Attachments

*   The following attachments are available for download:
    *   23-0218\_WS\_ANNEX\_E\_STANDARD\_RFB\_AMD2\_EN.pdf
